r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: Bugs Fixed: - Quick fix on handle_mapping. arrval should be used instead of retval (jabiinfante) - #71696 Bad datetime management (bocharov) - Fix memory leak in mapping with sequence (bocharov) - Fix anchor in anchor problemo (bocharov) - Fix tests bug_64019.phpt, bug_parsing_alias.phpt (bocharov) - #72204 Crash when try to parse yaml file
